text: Boldbaataryn Bold-Erdene (born June 24, 1983) is a Mongolian cyclist. ==Palmares== ;2005 :2nd National Road Championship :2nd National Time Trial Championship :20px National Cross Country Champion ;2006 :2nd National Time Trial Championship :3rd National Road Championship ;2008 :2nd National Road Championship :3rd National Time Trial Championship ;2009 :20px National Road Champion :20px National Time Trial Champion :1st stage 2 Tour of Mongolia ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Mongolian male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Cyclists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Mongolia
title: Boldbaataryn Bold-Erdene
